channel.title: Deleting a conjured up npc?
channel.description:
I don't normally ask for help, but i need help on this bit.
Well, say i want the attack option on my NPC to remove the npc from my server, how would i do this? As in, deleting the npc to say.
Thanks

item.title: Deleting a conjured up npc?
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

Thats easy lol…

Its just, for my latest piece of work im making summoning.

I have made it so you can summon 1 npc maximum, you can’t attack it.

But they have 3 options.

Here is a picture.

I found the packet that it uses when i click on expell, but i need to find a way to delete the summoned npc after i use this.

Read full topic

item.title: Deleting a conjured up npc?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

I have no idea, but I know how to make them unattackable.
